entities.description: The context of the social surroundings, including beliefs and interactions within a community.
The faith-based principles commonly held by an individual or group.
The significance attributed to having friends who share similar religious beliefs.
The answer given by respondents to survey questions, often in a predefined format such as agreement levels.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to aspects of social interactions and context.
Indicates the religious beliefs held by the respondent.
Highlights the importance of having friends who share similar religious beliefs.
Links the survey to specific responses provided by the respondents.
